title: Workshop on Developing Interactive Apps for Science Education for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of science curriculum content
context.additional_context: A process for in-service secondary school teachers to acquire coding-based app development competencies for improving science instruction

learning_goals: Learners develop one or more interactive app prototypes explaining scientific concepts using MIT App Inventor.
Learners create design documents applying coding elements (variables, conditional statements, logical operations) to science education contexts.
Learners provide and incorporate feedback on app interfaces and educational effectiveness through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
